类 Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • Library.Bomb
  • 直接已知子类:
    ProduceBombs

    public abstract class Bomb
extends java.lang.Object
    从以下版本开始:
    3/21/2019 8:41 PM This class is abstract and should be extended to provide the domain specific functionality.
    作者:
    Hephaest

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Bomb(GameBoard board)
      Create bombs, which can be placed on a GameBoard.
